comment.author: 40335888@N07
comment._content: I've noticed the Brisbane Courier has lots of references to Flinders Parade as "Lower Esplanade" and present-day Eagle Terrace as "Upper Esplanade".  There's a few other street names that don't seem to exist - Maxwell Street and Slaughter Street.  Also Kate Street is referred to as being by the waterfront, so I assume Pier Avenue/Pier Street was Kate Street before the pier was built.
